user_question: How can I improve my sleep quality and generate an image of a peaceful bedroom?
final_answer: To improve sleep quality: maintain a consistent sleep schedule, create a restful environment, limit exposure to screens before bed, and avoid caffeine late in the day. Image of a peaceful bedroom generated. Popular sleep tracking apps include Sleep Cycle, Pillow, and SleepScore.
